page.title: 13Buses Kirmington and area
page.content:
The Lincolnshire Road Car Company Limited provides the Public Bus Services in this area.The most frequent service is the 364 which makes 6 daily return journeys between Grimsby and Scunthorpe, stopping at Kirmington.The service does not operate on Sundays. The 850 service now uses the 'new' A180 and passes through the survey area without stopping. This service operates from Grimsby to Hull 3 times a day.
The secondary school pupils from Kirmington and Croxton are taken by a free school bus to Brigg, leaving the village at 8.20 in the morning.
